# fmc_interface_groups (Data Source)

This data source reads the Interface Groups.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "fmc_interface_groups" "example" {
  items = {
    "my_interface_groups" = {
    }
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `domain` (String) Name of the FMC domain
- `items` (Attributes Map) Map of Interface Groups. The key of the map is the name of the individual Interface Group. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Id of the object

<a id="nestedatt--items"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Id of the Security Zone.
- `interface_type` (String) All interfaces' types must match the interface mode.
- `interfaces` (Attributes Set) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--items--interfaces))
- `type` (String) Type of the object; this value is always 'InterfaceGroup'.

<a id="nestedatt--items--interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `items.interfaces`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Id of the interface.
